prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with bright yellow and white colors, featuring a distinctive horn.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that resembles a caterpillar, with eyes that express curiosity and innocence.
Generate a whimsical insect Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, showcasing vibrant colors and playful features.
Make a unique creature with a segmented body and a small spike on its head, perfect for a forest setting.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves into a more powerful form, starting as a small, yellow caterpillar-like creature.
Design an adorable, non-legendary Pokemon with a friendly demeanor, ideal for trainers who love bug types.
Give me a visual of a Basic stage Pokemon that prefers to live in wooded areas, easily recognizable by its colors.
